contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox person | name = Zane Huett | image = | caption = | birthname = Zane Alexander Huett | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1997|5|9}} | other_names = The Zanerator | birth_place = [[Riverside, California|Riverside]], [[California]], [[United States|U.S.]] | occupation = Actor | years_active = 2003-present }} '''Zane Alexander Huett''' (born May 9, 1997) is an [[United States|American]] [[child actor]]. Zane is most famous for his featured role on the [[American Broadcasting Company|ABC]] [[television series]] ''[[Desperate Housewives]]'' playing the role of [[Parker Scavo]], the younger son of [[Lynette Scavo|Lynette]] and [[Tom Scavo]]. He plays the youngest Scavo boy, yet is older by six months than the actors [[Brent Kinsman]] and [[Shane Kinsman]] who play the older Scavo boys. ''[[Desperate Housewives]]'' is Huett's first role for television. Other film credits include ''[[Mysterious Skin]]'' and ''P.O.V.: The Camera's Eye''. He has a younger sister (Zoe Huett) who also acts on occasion. Zane currently serves as a StarPower Ambassador for Starlight Children’s Foundation, encouraging other young people to commit their time, energy and resources to help other kids and working with Starlight to brighten the lives of seriously ill children. [source – www.starlight.org/starpowerambassadors] ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" !style="background:#B0C4DE;"|Year !style="background:#B0C4DE;"|Title !style="background:#B0C4DE;"|Role !style="background:#B0C4DE;"|Notes |- |2003||''[[P.O.V.: The Camera's Eye]]''||Zane||TV-movie |- |rowspan=2|2004||''[[Just Another Day in the Neighborhood]]''||Billy || |- |''[[Mysterious Skin]]''||Jackson's Son|| |- |2004-2010 || ''[[Desperate Housewives]]'' || [[List of Desperate Housewives characters#Parker Scavo|Parker Scavo]] || recurring role |- |rowspan=2|2009 || ''[[Big Love]]'' || kid || Episode: "Block Party" |- | ''[[Dear Lemon Lima]]'' || Hercules Howard|| |- |2010||''[[Rock The House]]''||Tommy|| TV movie |} ==Awards== {| border="2" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 90%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" ! colspan="5" style="background: LightSteelBlue;"|Awards |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" ! align="center"| Year ! width="50"| Result ! width="150"| Award ! width="425"| Category ! width="200"| Nominated Work |- | 2005 | {{won}} |[[Young Artist Awards]] | Best Performance in a TV Series (Comedy or Drama): Young Actor age 10 or Younger | rowspan=4| ''[[Desperate Housewives]]'' |- | 2007 | {{nom}} | [[Screen Actors Guild Awards]] | Outstanding Performance by an Ensamble in a TV Series |- | 2008 | {{nom}} | [[Screen Actors Guild Awards]] | Outstanding Performance by an Ensamble in a TV Series |- | 2009 | {{nom}} | [[Screen Actors Guild Awards]] | Outstanding Performance by an Ensamble in a TV Series |} ==External links== *{{IMDb name|id=1287507}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Huett, Zane | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = American actor | DATE OF BIRTH =May 9, 1997 | PLACE OF BIRTH =[[Riverside, California|Riverside]], [[California]], [[United States|U.S.]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Huett, Zane}} [[Category:1997 births]] [[Category:Living people]] {{US-actor-stub}}
